tool_description: Font hinting (also known as instructing) is the use of mathematical instructions to adjust the display of an outline font so that it lines up with a rasterized grid. At low screen resolutions, hinting is critical for producing clear, legible text. Use this API to integrate font hinting in your workflow.
name: Font Hinting
title: Font Hinting

api_list.name: Hint Font

optional_parameters.name: adjustsubglyphs
optional_parameters.description: Should adjust sub glyphs? Default enabled.

optional_parameters.name: binaryresult
optional_parameters.description: Return converted file in binary format, the default is base64 json response.

optional_parameters.name: hintcomposites
optional_parameters.description: Should hint composite glyphs? Default enabled.

api_list.name: List Fonts
api_list.description: Get the list of the fonts in the system

required_parameters.name: start
required_parameters.description: Starting index. This required since the result is paged.

optional_parameters.name: public
optional_parameters.description: Should return public fonts in the result or not?
